title: New client crashed, giving me a Dodging penalty.
body:
I was duoing with a friend on the new client and while I was in champ select, my client crashed right as I was about to pick. I didn't send a report because I impulsively clicked "don't send" so I would return to the champ select, but it just restarted my launcher and told me that I had dodged and was returned to the launcher.
When the launcher rebooted, I also noticed that I had lost all of the IP from my last game (79, putting me at 3805 IP). It wasn't that much IP, but there is nothing I hate more than saving up so could I have it back?
Along with the IP, can my queue timer be lifted? I didn't dodge purposefully, and my wifi is perfectly fine at the moment.

Note- I put this in Help and Support because in the "Report A Bug" section one of the pinned threads said to put leaverbuster bugs here.
Note 2- This has happened to me before when loading into a game. Right as the client closed to open the game the little ziggs artwork appeared.

replies.body: Selecting don't send wouldn't return you to a game, as a bugsplat indicates a critical fail of the game that failed to load properly.  This is usually caused by a bad driver, game file, or something else so it's likely that you'll get the error again.  You should use the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubelshoot this and fix the cause.  If you're on the updated client, I'd then suggest a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) and return to the legacy client, should will update your IP Balance.  I hope that helps!

Thank you so much! I will look through the guide and reinstall.
Will I be able to get the penalty removed? It's only five minutes but I don't think it was right that I recieved it.

We aren't able to remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Even though it wasn't intentional, the system still treats all leaves equally because leaving causes others a negative experience.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Ok, thanks for telling me. It's alright, I can live with it.
